snippet: Liliana Trafficante stole more than $1 million from investors through a fictional proposal to build a water park in Goshen, N.Y., for foster children.
abstract: Liliana Trafficante is sentenced to 41 months in prison for stealing more than $1 million from investors through a fictional proposal to build a water park in Goshen, NY, for foster children.
lead_paragraph: Liliana Trafficante stole more than $1 million from investors through a fictional proposal to build a water park in Goshen, N.Y., for foster children.

headline.main: Woman Sentenced to 41 Months for Fake Water Park Plan
headline.print_headline: Woman Sentenced to 41 Months for Fake Plan for Water Park
